<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Clearing password field - vm_vdr_contact</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var userSysIdToPasswordHashObj = {
  "239e02e4877700103058d1a936cb0b52": "$s$2kUrOzZdhZztu7Yk4fvhgBbySHt/urGWCUDBu2Dx9I4=$ggZY9Rxtk/DLqjTSfl/ge4KljkRw94bU09CMg67x12c=",
  "2d3ecaa4877700103058d1a936cb0b77": "$s$2kUrOzZdhZztu7Yk4fvhgBbySHt/urGWCUDBu2Dx9I4=$ggZY9Rxtk/DLqjTSfl/ge4KljkRw94bU09CMg67x12c=",
  "307534f01b045010c3182f452a4bcb0d": "$s$uVzo4+A8MppzgdMdl2ajr/Q1mi3Jl7P9H8yzfd0yqoM=$RKwtjwyxZtGaEOeTZ9gRmV5kA2VtdGJG20596ble9Tw=",
  "786314f5877b00103058d1a936cb0b5f": "$s$2kUrOzZdhZztu7Yk4fvhgBbySHt/urGWCUDBu2Dx9I4=$ggZY9Rxtk/DLqjTSfl/ge4KljkRw94bU09CMg67x12c=",
  "8ffd8aa4877700103058d1a936cb0b50": "$s$2kUrOzZdhZztu7Yk4fvhgBbySHt/urGWCUDBu2Dx9I4=$ggZY9Rxtk/DLqjTSfl/ge4KljkRw94bU09CMg67x12c=",
  "96ee1cd5a4d03200964f2a957bf74187": "$s$20Xzy3l4Ght2jd64uSTjiYbHNSfZxBKanmtt6IqVF1E=$yHcKhXKC7qDP+JBvC4bx7BTR7Xz2R9iDlX2RnwJfNzM=",
  "9936b4f01b045010c3182f452a4bcb72": "$s$om7bxblM2H78HdbJ8m98adHgUQR4z596/XqSClF3tlw=$NuLO9qJEDm9MSVivf8AXl41OucpkUcaOXlAGtreFVHY=",
  "a635b0f01b045010c3182f452a4bcbcf": "$s$vj+I097z1/1rjRMo8Dy1vpYtS7NSpzBfL7/4QoeU7uA=$dk4xkM61JRvMSlTI1pSpYLqGR5s39igZnTOUuvGOAoM=",
  "bff470f01b045010c3182f452a4bcbcb": "$s$i+ktgtDz6Zl3u4jj3DSiIjvQPjHa3JnFV4qGuhjiQWQ=$SsOlYdhxt34XyDbO2WdGZK8iv8J8j0I7CRIWwddXAtg=",
  "c8de82e4877700103058d1a936cb0b2b": "$s$2kUrOzZdhZztu7Yk4fvhgBbySHt/urGWCUDBu2Dx9I4=$ggZY9Rxtk/DLqjTSfl/ge4KljkRw94bU09CMg67x12c=",
  "d47354f5877b00103058d1a936cb0b27": "$s$2kUrOzZdhZztu7Yk4fvhgBbySHt/urGWCUDBu2Dx9I4=$ggZY9Rxtk/DLqjTSfl/ge4KljkRw94bU09CMg67x12c=",
  "fcb174701b045010c3182f452a4bcb77": "$s$RwH7bDkTTgJzeG4f192dfn2WhffLDOWOQ3FcyoEJwsg=$Oe9ieBBJsma9KvuPftPIN9tTIi2IVfEV6UwzwGn0yjI="
};

var sysIdArray = Object.keys(userSysIdToPasswordHashObj);

var contactGr = new GlideRecord('vm_vdr_contact');
contactGr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', sysIdArray);
contactGr.query();

while (contactGr.next()) {
  if (contactGr.user_password == userSysIdToPasswordHashObj[contactGr.getUniqueValue()]) {
    contactGr.user_password = '';
    contactGr.setWorkflow(false);
    contactGr.update();
  }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-04-08 22:19:50</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>ca7c601f539320104f3eddeeff7b121d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Clearing password field - vm_vdr_contact</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">4c821a2d9f42220030581471367fcf2c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">4c821a2d9f42220030581471367fcf2c</sys_scope>

    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
